info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for favorites.

get.description: Gets a list of favorites defined within an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: favoriteType
parameters.description: The type of favorite. Value can be either shared or user.

parameters.name: sourceType
parameters.description: Source type of favorite to return. When left out, the source type defaults to 'other' (not present in this enum).

parameters.name: canFetchContent
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the full content for each applicable favorite. If false, only return summary content for favorites.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags that must be present on each favorite returned.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more favorite definitions associated to the Application Insights component.

get.description: Get a single favorite by its FavoriteId, defined within an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

200.description: A favorite definition associated to the Application Insights component.

put.description: Adds a new favorites to an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new favorite and add it to an Application Insights component.

200.description: The newly created favorite that is associated to the Application Insights component.

delete.description: Remove a favorite that is associated to an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

200.description: The favorite has been successfully removed from the Application Insights component.

patch.description: Updates a favorite that has already been added to an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: favoriteId
parameters.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to update the existing favorite.

Category.description: Favorite category, as defined by the user at creation time.

Config.description: Configuration of this particular favorite, which are driven by the Azure portal UX. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

FavoriteId.description: Internally assigned unique id of the favorite definition.

FavoriteType.description: Enum indicating if this favorite definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

IsGeneratedFromTemplate.description: Flag denoting wether or not this favorite was generated from a template.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the favorite.

SourceType.description: The source of the favorite definition.

Tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this favorite definition

TimeModified.description: Date and time in UTC of the last modification that was made to this favorite definition.

UserId.description: Unique user id of the specific user that owns this favorite.

Version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked favorite. Current examples include MetricsExplorer (ME) and Search.

ApplicationInsightsComponentFavorite.description: Properties that define a favorite that is associated to an Application Insights component.

CanFetchFavoriteContentParameter.name: canFetchContent
CanFetchFavoriteContentParameter.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the full content for each applicable favorite. If false, only return summary content for favorites.

FavoriteIdParameter.name: favoriteId
FavoriteIdParameter.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

FavoriteTypeParameter.name: favoriteType
FavoriteTypeParameter.description: The type of favorite. Value can be either shared or user.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

SourceTypeParameter.name: sourceType
SourceTypeParameter.description: Source type of favorite to return. When left out, the source type defaults to 'other' (not present in this enum).

TagsFilterParameter.name: tags
TagsFilterParameter.description: Tags that must be present on each favorite returned.
